original_text:
Woe to the many nations that rage—
    they rage like the raging sea!
Woe to the peoples who roar—
    they roar like the roaring of great waters!
korean_text: 슬프다 많은 민족이 소동하였으되 바다 파도가 치는 소리 같이 그들이 소동하였고 열방이 충돌하였으되 큰 물이 몰려옴 같이 그들도 충돌하였도다

sentences.original_text: Woe to the many nations that rage
they rage like the raging sea
Woe to the peoples who roar
they roar like the roaring of great waters
